author: julianfoad
msg: Re-write a 'log -g' test to work without using mergeinfo that refers to a
change number r0. A follow-up to r925290 and r925511. I verified that the
updated test still fails if the issue #3172 bug fix (r870836) is removed.
"r0" as the revision for the non-existent merge source.  Expand the
test coverage and documentation a little.
(test_list): Remove the "Wimp" expectation from this test.

author: markt
msg: Fire listeners in reverse order for requestDestroyed

author: arkurth
msg: Changed set_computer_name.vbs to call "%comspec% /c type currentimage.txt" rather than using the VBScript commands to open and read the file.  This corrects a problem if certain applications such as Aspen are installed in the image which have some sort of hook into the VBScript file open command.  A box was being displayed during Sysprep minisetup asking for the application's installation files.

author: lukaszlenart
msg: Resolved WW-3409 - OSGi plugin not properly loading freemarker results from bundles
